name: Cuicacalli Escuela De Danza
description: Cuicacalli Escuela de Danza builds communities through dance, expanding, exploring, and celebrating the dance traditions of Mexico and beyond, including folkloric, hip hop, and modern dance styles. Classes are led and directed by Cuicacalli founder Jesus Cortes.
fullDescription: Cuicacalli Escuela de Danza builds communities through dance, expanding, exploring, and celebrating the dance traditions of Mexico and beyond, including folkloric, hip hop, and modern dance styles. Classes are led and directed by Cuicacalli founder Jesus Cortes.
whatTheyOffer: Cuicacalli Escuela de Danza builds communities through dance, expanding, exploring, and celebrating the dance traditions of Mexico and beyond, including folkloric, hip hop, and modern dance styles. Classes are led and directed by Cuicacalli founder Jesus Cortes.
howToGetIt: To enroll in the Cuicacalli Escuela De Danza, please click on the link below and complete the application. Once completed, you will receive an email back from the Education Director, Isis Castillo with additional information. https://www.brava.org/apply For more information please contact Cuicacalli's Jesus Cortes at cuicacalli.sf@gmail.com or 415-672-6550.
cost: $12 per class. Scholarships and work trade available.
agency: Brava! for Women in the Arts
